longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay.

Visa required.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of French West Indies will be
  expected to hold their own passport or National ID Card
  (where applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia,
  Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, exists from June through October in areas bordering
  Tajikistan and Uzbekistan (Batken, Jalal-Abad and Osh
  regions) and in the outskirts of Bishkek. Recommended
  prevention: A.
